warnings.message: LWC1145: Invalid attributes detected on template. The following attributes are not supported on template tags in LWC: class. For more information, please visit https://lwc.dev/guide/reference#html-template-directives

LWC1153: Non-root template elements must contain valid LWC template directives. Otherwise, the template and its children will be ignored. For more information please visit https://lwc.dev/guide/reference#html-template-directives
